languages.text: If the wearer is an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} and successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an enemy's attack, it automatically creates an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} on that enemy on the side closest to the wearer.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] When a wielder successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} or parries an enemy's attack, it automatically creates an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}Opening{/g} for that enemy on the side closest to the wielder.

If the wearer is an Assassin and successfully dodges or parries an enemy's attack, it automatically creates an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} on that enemy on the side closest to the wearer.

If the wearer is an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} and successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an enemy's attack, it automatically creates an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} on that enemy on the side closest to the wearer.

If the wearer is an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} and successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an enemy's attack, it automatically creates an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} on that enemy on the side closest to the wearer.

languages.text: Если персонаж, который является {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасином{/g}, избегает вражеской атаки, совершая {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g}, он автоматически выявляет дополнительное {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}слабое место{/g} противника с ближайшей к себе стороны.
languages.original_text: If the wearer is an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} and successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an enemy's attack, it automatically creates an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} on that enemy on the side closest to the wearer.

traits.locale_text: Если персонаж, который является ассасином, избегает вражеской атаки, совершая уклонение или парирование, он автоматически выявляет дополнительное {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}слабое место{/g} противника с ближайшей к себе стороны.

Если персонаж, который является ассасином, избегает вражеской атаки, совершая уклонение или парирование, он автоматически выявляет дополнительное {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}слабое место{/g} противника с ближайшей к себе стороны.

languages.text: 如果装备者是{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}，当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}敌人的攻击时，会在敌人距离装备者最近的方向发现一处额外的{g|Encyclopedia:Opening}破绽{/g}。
languages.original_text: If the wearer is an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} and successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an enemy's attack, it automatically creates an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} on that enemy on the side closest to the wearer.

traits.locale_text: 如果装备者是刺客，当装备者闪避或招架敌人的攻击时，会在敌人距离装备者最近的方向发现一处额外的{g|Encyclopedia:Opening}破绽{/g}。

languages.text: 着用者が{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}で、敵の攻撃をうまく{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}した場合、または{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}た場合、着用者に一番近いサイドの敵に自動的に{g|Encyclopedia:Opening}隙{/g}が追加される。
languages.original_text: If the wearer is an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} and successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an enemy's attack, it automatically creates an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} on that enemy on the side closest to the wearer.

traits.locale_text: 着用者がアサシンで、敵の攻撃をうまく回避した場合、または受け流した場合、着用者に一番近いサイドの敵に自動的に{g|Encyclopedia:Opening}隙{/g}が追加される。

languages.text: Si el portador es {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesino{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}para{/g} un ataque del enemigo, automáticamente crea una {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}abertura{/g} adicional en ese enemigo en el lado más cercano al portador.
languages.original_text: If the wearer is an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} and successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an enemy's attack, it automatically creates an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} on that enemy on the side closest to the wearer.

traits.locale_text: Si el portador es asesino y esquiva o para un ataque del enemigo, automáticamente crea una {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}abertura{/g} adicional en ese enemigo en el lado más cercano al portador.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger ein {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassine{/g} ist und einen feindlichen Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pariert{/g} oder diesem {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweicht{/g}, erzeugt dies automatische eine {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}Blöße{/g} bei dem Feind, der dem Träger am nächsten ist.
languages.original_text: If the wearer is an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} and successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an enemy's attack, it automatically creates an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} on that enemy on the side closest to the wearer.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger ein Assassine ist und erfolgreich einen feindlichen Angriff pariert oder ihm ausweicht, erzeugt dies automatische eine {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}Blöße{/g} bei dem Feind, der dem Träger am nächsten ist.

languages.text: Si l'utilisateur est un {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassin{/g} et qu'il réussit à {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} ou à {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parer{/g} l'attaque d'un ennemi, il crée automatiquement une {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}brèche{/g} supplémentaire sur cet ennemi du côté le plus proche de l'utilisateur.
languages.original_text: If the wearer is an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} and successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an enemy's attack, it automatically creates an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} on that enemy on the side closest to the wearer.

traits.locale_text: Si l'utilisateur est un Assassin et qu'il réussit à esquiver ou à parer l'attaque d'un ennemi, il crée automatiquement une {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}brèche{/g} supplémentaire sur cet ennemi du côté le plus proche de l'utilisateur.
